name: Doomsday Dispute
description:
Earth, year 2200.

After the Great War, the majority fled from the planet Earth. Citizens who are remained fight for food and water, and try to survive under this harsh condition…
Those that couldn’t afford to leave the planet, suffered from the consequences of the War; the planet has become a barren yet dangerous, its inhabitants, mutated into creatures that only crave for flesh and blood.
Now a group of elites is making their way back to Earth and carry the mission of saving those survivors. Are they really ready what the Earth has become?

Real-time combat situation

Besieging, attacking and defending the city, all of these, in this game is no longer a rigid text war report. Powerful picture performance tension not only allows players to experience the immersive blood situation. More importantly, it will let you know the reasons of your defeat on the battlefield and learn from the lessons.

Defend your territory

Protect your troops and heroes, survive against zombies, and defend your territory at all costs.

Find Friends

Fight and counterattack with your kingdom's army allies, and ride into war together as a guild against zombies.

Powerful Heroes

Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills for the arena! Let them lead, attack, and conquer your enemies.

Master Your War Strategy

Plan your tactics for the clash! Plan your troop lineups, perfect your strategy, and counterattack! Discover the best way to defeat enemies
